data.eml:eml: A new species of clawed frog (genus Xenopus) from the Itombwe Massif, Democratic Republic of the Congo: implications for DNA barcodes and biodiversity conservation.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Evans, Ben J., Carter, Timothy F., Tobias, Martha L., Kelley, Darcy B. (2008): A new species of clawed frog (genus Xenopus) from the Itombwe Massif, Democratic Republic of the Congo: implications for DNA barcodes and biodiversity conservation. Zootaxa 1780: 55-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.182322
